pageContext.claim: “It appears that an American spy in one of our intelligence agencies may have been spying on our own president. The complaint suggests that this intel agent was listening in on Trump’s conversation .with a foreign leader. Was this person officially asked to listen to the conversation or was he or she secretly listening in?”
pageContext.analysis: The Whistleblower was not listening in on the call, but reported what other administration officials said about the call. Once the rough transcript was released, it was clear that his description was accurate.
